net.ashwork.upvote.manager

Interface VoteManager<USER,ITEM,VOTE,TIME,ENTRY extends VoteEntry<USER,ITEM,VOTE,TIME>,RESPONSE>

  • Type Parameters:
    USER - the type of the user
    ITEM - the type of the item
    VOTE - the type of the vote
    TIME - the type of the time
    ENTRY - the type of the entry holding the vote
    RESPONSE - the type of the response to the actions
    All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractInputManager<ENTRY,RESPONSE>

    public interface VoteManager<USER,ITEM,VOTE,TIME,ENTRY extends VoteEntry<USER,ITEM,VOTE,TIME>,RESPONSE>
extends AbstractInputManager<ENTRY,RESPONSE>
    A manager that collects votes and tallies them.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    See Also:
    VoteEntry

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default RESPONSE castVote(ENTRY entry)
      A wrapper around AbstractInputManager.putEntry(Object) to give a more meaningful name in context.
      RESPONSE tally()
      Tallies the result of the collected votes.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.ashwork.upvote.manager.AbstractInputManager

        putEntry

    • Method Detail

      • castVote

        default RESPONSE castVote(ENTRY entry)
        A wrapper around AbstractInputManager.putEntry(Object) to give a more meaningful name in context.
        Parameters:
        entry - the vote entry to put into the manager
        Returns:
        the response created as a result of the operation
        See Also:
        AbstractInputManager.putEntry(Object)

      • tally

        RESPONSE tally()
        Tallies the result of the collected votes.
        Returns:
        the response created as a result of the tally
